message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I want to set a deposit limit on my account to help me stay in control of my spending. How can I do that?

I completely understand, and I’d be happy to assist you with that. Let’s run through security so I can access your account and provide the next steps. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Kevin Brown, my email is kevin.b@example.com, and my date of birth is August 12, 1984.

Thanks, Kevin. That's all correct! You can set deposit limits through your account settings under the 'Responsible Gaming' section. Limits can be set daily, weekly, or monthly depending on your preference.
That’s good to know. Can I change the limit later if I want to?
Yes, you can adjust your deposit limits at any time. However, please note that increasing the limit will take effect after a 24-hour cooling-off period, while decreasing it is applied immediately.
Got it. Is there a way to set limits for specific games or betting types?

Absolutely! You can set limits for specific games or betting categories by visiting the 'Gaming Limits' section in your account. This allows you to manage how much you spend on particular types of games.
That sounds great. I’ll go ahead and set my limits now. Thanks for your help!
You're very welcome, Kevin! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
